rukus.text: Say: â€œO you Al-Kafirun (Those who disbelieve Al-Kitab)
I do not obey whatever you worship
while you are not worshippers to That Whom I pay obedience
and I am not obedient to what you worshipped
while you are not worshippers to That Whom I pay obedience
To you (be) your way of life; and to me, my Religion (which comes from the Creator)
